title: # 312 - Gary Owen & ME
description:
I sit down with comedian Gary Owen and we talk about moving to San Francisco, auditioning for the comedy store, Nick Cannon, Gary's childhood, being an urban comedian, having a mentally challenged cousin, Louis Farrakhan, and much more!

We added 2nd shows on select dates for my “Body Shots” world tour. Use promo code “Shots” for pre sale tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

This episode is brought to you by "You Up?" with Nikki Glazer. "You Up?" is now a podcast! Subscribe now on Apple Podcasts or your favorite podcast app. You can also listen to the show on Sirius XM's Comedy Central Radio Channel 95 every Monday through Thursday at 10am.

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcasted

This episode is also brought to you by Misen. Get a free paring knife when you order a chefs knife at www.misen.co/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Robinhood. Buy and sell stocks with the Robinhood app. Right now Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock like Apple, Ford, or Sprint to help build your portfolio. Go to www.Bertcast.robinhood.com and sign up today.  

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
